page.title: 17Manager:Rowntree Mackintosh
page.content: {Looking around the factory there were {very few coloured people present.Is {this because they do not live around {here or do they just not like the {work? We do not have many immigrant employees,but this is just a reflection on the population of York. It is Company policy to have no discrimination on the basis of Race, Religion or Sex.Ethnic background of employees is not recorded.This is seen as a form of discrimination in itself. {Men seem to be working in shifts and {women do not. Is this deliberate {policy? It dates back to Factory Act legislation. We would have to get exemption to work women on shifts. The demandfor women to work on shifts is not very great,but we have applied for exemption in some areas. (cont p 18)
